data.message:
I love you! -> You can say what you want! I'll NEVER give up on 'Eminem'! I"ll never stop loving him.
He isn't just a rapper to me! He is so much more
He's strong! He's my soldier
He's beautiful! Inside (outside :D)
He's Infinite
He's my hero, my superman
He's my life.. he saved me,
When life is hard, i listen to his lyrics, He never give up, so i'm not giving up!
'mashall bruce mathers III' is my hope, and not only for me
I"m a STAN -
-shady's
-True
-Army
-Nation ..
And i'm proud to be one! Never though there could be a person who really made a diffrence 2 my life!
But you did marshall ! Thank you for everything! I wish i could thank you ..
But one day i'll be here, in the crowd seporting you!
And to haters we say "FUCK YOU"
And even i thank you stans for being there for eminem, i care f* much about him! And i always will.
Alot of people dont understand me, they dont understand what i feel for him!
" it's just the way i am"
He has been trough alot of things.. and knowing all those things makes me sad.
But my soldier is strong .. " I wanna just say thanks cause your hate is what gave me the strengt"
It only made us "stronger than i was"
Thank you Mashall Bruce Mathers III.. our rap god, my life, the day he dies, my hart will die with him
